meta-description: Liferay Digital Solutions Forum 2017 (LDSF) is the annual event for organisations putting people at the customer experience at the centre of their digital strategy. With presentations from HP Enterprise, Forrester, Degussa Bank, Knowledge Hub and sessions on GDPR, DevOps and the technology developments that matter most.

title: Liferay Digital Solutions Forum UK 2017
